title: Experiences of Sound ✨ Niemand ist nicht musikalisch
description: She's Excited! creates interactive showcases that transform the audience into performers and invite them to participate in sonic journeys through different elements and worlds.At the Waterkant Festival she presents "Solastalgia", a brief interactive and immersive trip through the element water and the impact of climate change on our surroundings and emotions – featuring visuals by the digital artist Letizia Artioli and the geographer Volker Wichmann.She's Excited! also produces music influenced by David Bowie, Grace Jones and Laurie Anderson. Her genre-bending Indie Pop invites the listeners to explore dark corners and bright reflections of this multifaceted world we all live in.

speakers.name: Anne Wichmann
speakers.description: Anne Wichmann, known artistically as She's Excited!, is an award-winning music producer, powerhouse performer, and sound artist based in New York City and Munich. She designs and produces interactive immersive showcases that break down the barrier between audience and artists.
